lejos.robotics
Class RangeReadings

java.lang.Object
  java.util.ArrayList<RangeReading>
      lejos.robotics.RangeReadings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<RangeReading>, Collection<RangeReading>, List<RangeReading>, RandomAccess, Transmittable
public class RangeReadings
extends ArrayList<RangeReading>
implements Transmittable

Represents a set of range readings.

Author:
Lawrie Griffiths
